page.title: 16Community Leisure,Stevenage
page.content: In our area we have{Hampson Park}and {St.Nicholas Park;}we liked the tunnels with slides on top,the swings and play area and the field for football and other games at St.Nicholas.There is a hall for Scouts and other activities as well. There are two{community centres},the biggest is at the{Oval.}For young children there are playgroups,mothers and toddlers'groups and under fives dance times.For older children there are{youth clubs,gym clubs,Brownies}and films in the holidays.Anyone can attend{keep fit,yoga,bingo},jumble sales or slimming clubs.For the elder- ly there is a{Golden Age club}and a lunch club. At{St.Nicholas}there are few shops so not many people know about the centre although there are activities daily. Vandalism is a problem there,sadly.
